item.title: The unix-way and unzip
item.description: The whole world use ZIP package format. Nothing can be done, that is the fact. This poor compression format got famous thanks to the WinZIP utility and tons of its clones. We, Linux and UNIX fans, use tarballs. This name was generalized and estabilished as a term for all compresset tar files. The most famous compression programs are gzip, bzip2 or the old guy named compress. All the utilities I just mentioned above works the UNIX WAY(TM).
